channel.title: Summer Vacation
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Summer Vacation" - Reason why I'm inactive

item.title: Re: Summer Vacation
item.content:encoded:
That's long break. Best would be if you left village and when you came back from trip just ask to join again.

Also be careful because from I remember characters are deleted after 2 months since last log.

Have a nice trip.

item.title: Summer Vacation
item.content:encoded:
Since all my exams and school are done I'm going on a long Summer Vacation Trip with my family… I won't be able to use the net so I can't be online for a pretty long time… If you feel like kicking me from the village then please accept me when I come back :)
And please don't blow it up before I come back if you think about blowing it up…
My Vacation will be about 30 days and I'll be back before you know it :)

KakashiHMF
